Package poisedPackage

Class ExistingProjects

java.lang.Object
poisedPackage.InputChecks
poisedPackage.ExistingProjects
public class ExistingProjects
extends InputChecks
Project Management System for Poised. ExistingProjects is a subclass / child that inherits methods from the InputChecks superclass / Parent.

This class contains methods to find, and view on projects in the Poised Management System. The Poised MainMenu class, which runs the main program, calls on methods from this class to perform various methods on projects managed by the Company.

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    ExistingProjects()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    int findProject​(java.lang.String projectInfo)
    Find project method runs through project info in the CurrentProjects.txt file to locate a particular project object needed.
    void viewProjects()
    The viewProjects method calls CurrentProjects.txt and split them into a String array for the file to be display.

  • Constructor Details

    • ExistingProjects

      public ExistingProjects()

  • Method Details

    • viewProjects

      public void viewProjects()
      The viewProjects method calls CurrentProjects.txt and split them into a String array for the file to be display.

      The projects are each displayed onto the console in an easy-to-read format.

    • findProject

      public int findProject​(java.lang.String projectInfo)
      Find project method runs through project info in the CurrentProjects.txt file to locate a particular project object needed.

      It takes in one parameter with string info related to the project and returns an integer to indicate the line number of the project being located.

      Parameters:
      projectInfo - either a project number or project name to identify the project object
      Returns:
      returns an integer lineCount to indicate the line number of the project in the text file
